#summary Notes on which browser configurations are supported, and any browser-specific caveats

We expect the Google documentation reader to work, and to work well, for any modern browser.  We specifically test with:
  * Internet Explorer 6 (Windows)
  * Internet Explorer 7 (Windows)
  * Firefox 1.5 (Linux, Mac, and Windows)
  * Firefox 2.0 (Linux, Mac, and Windows)
  * Safari 2 (Mac)
